detail_desc: Jacket in washed, stretch denim with a collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Pocket flaps at the front with a button.
Ribbed top in soft jersey made from a mulberry silk and cotton blend with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a V-neck front and back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist with wide elastication and a high cut at the back.
Pyjama T-shirt and shorts in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with a print motif on the front. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck with a lace detail at the front, and long, wide sleeves with narrow elastication and a flare at the cuffs.

5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed denim with stretch. Regular waist, zip fly and button, and gently tapered legs. The jeans are made from selvedge denim, a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red/white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling.
Slightly shorter, gently fitted, long-sleeved top in stretch jersey with a soft, brushed finish.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Soft brushed inside.

Knee-length shirt dress in soft washed denim made from Tencel™ lyocell. Collar, buttons down the front, a detachable tie belt at the waist and a yoke with pleats at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved jersey top with a chest pocket and gently rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, patch front pockets with a flap and press-stud, and wide, gathered elastication at the hem. Unlined.

Sleeveless dress in a viscose weave with a round neck with an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist and a flounced wrapover hem. Unlined.
Short, flared skirt in plumeti chiffon with a jersey lining. High waist with covered elastication and a small frill trim.
Sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Boxy-style hooded top in soft, cotton sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing at the cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shaftless socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. The socks are designed to be hidden inside your shoes.
Wide jumper in a knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cold shoulder blouse in crinkled plumeti chiffon with a V-neck front and back, narrow, tie-top shoulder straps and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Partly lined.
Small umbrella with a telescopic handle and a fabric wrist strap. Size 7x15.5 cm folded.
Vest top in soft, patterned cotton jersey.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with long, raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Satin bomber jacket with a stand-up collar and zip down the front. Lined.
Faux fur gilet with side pockets and hook-and-eye fasteners at the front. Lined.

High-waisted, ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric. Wide panel to hold in and shape the waist containing a concealed key pocket. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique.
Short, padded parka with a lined hood and zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front.  Side pockets with concealed press-studs, and ribbed cuffs. Lined.
Baby Exclusive. Fine-knit trousers in organic cotton with an elasticated waist and legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbed hems.

Ankle-length joggers in woven fabric with elastication at the back of the waist. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Some of the polyester content of the joggers is recycled. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the thighs and knees to create a comfortable, straight silhouette.
Cargo trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, flap leg pockets, flap back pockets and legs that can be rolled up with a tab and press-stud.
Sandals in imitation patent leather decorated with tulle and chiffon flowers. Hook and loop tab at one side, imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Jacket in a patterned crêpe weave with a detachable tie belt at the waist and long sleeves with slits at the cuffs. No fasteners. Unlined.
Short swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Dress in soft, double-weave cotton with short frilled sleeves, a frill-trimmed yoke at the front and buttons at the back. Unlined.
Long cardigan in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, ribbed bands, patch front pockets and a ribbed hem. No fasteners.
Dress in lightweight, patterned sweatshirt fabric with short raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a detachable, braided belt at the waist and rounded hem.
Sports shorts in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and zipped side pockets. Unlined.
5-pocket, low-rise ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with worn details, a zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Waist-high briefs in lace with a V-shaped waist, and cut-out section at the back with wide satin ribbon ties. Lined gusset and a high cut at the back.
Soft, non-wired bras in cotton jersey with moulded, padded triangular cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and lace at the hem. No fasteners.
Herringbone-patterned scarf in a soft weave with fringes along the short sides.
Calf-length skirt in a viscose weave with buttons down the front and side pockets. Lined.
Ballet pumps with a decorative bow at the front. Satin linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a hood with a wide, fine-knit drawstring.

Short dress in airy chiffon with a flounce-trimmed V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and an elasticated seam at the waist. Sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs, and a flounce at the hem. Lined.
Cardigan in a soft knit with low dropped shoulders and wide, 3/4-length sleeves. No buttons.
Oversized jumper in a soft, fine cashmere knit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, low crotch, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar and classic front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, a chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Chinos in washed cotton twill. Casual style in a relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side and back pockets, and covered elastication at the hems.
Plastic hair elastics.
Calf-length skirt in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Metal rings in various designs.
Turban in a soft cotton knit with a knot detail at the front and a ribbed hem.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves and legs. Press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
Lace shortie briefs with a mid waist, lined gusset, low-cut legs and full coverage at the back.

Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved blouse in an organic cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Round neckline with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, narrow elastication at the cuffs and a scalloped hem. Lined.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets, and an adjustable tab at the sides.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft jersey with a slightly deeper neckline, chest pocket and rounded hem with short slits in the sides.
Fitted top in stretch organic cotton jersey with spaghetti shoulder straps and a V-neck with a discreet lace trim.
Leggings in stretch jersey with a denim look. Elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Short running shorts in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with hole-patterned side sections. Elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, a key pocket with a concealed zip at the back and reflective details. Lined with short tights that have an open pocket on one leg.
Thin metal rings in various designs.
Trousers in soft cotton canvas with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Side pockets, a coin pocket, back pockets and a pocket on one leg. Straight legs.
USB 2.0 charging cable suitable for iPhones 6/7/7+. Length approx. 80 cm when extended. The cable is only for charging and synchronisation via a computer.
Short top in soft, fine-knit slub cotton with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and embroidered appliqués on the front.
Jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a lined hood and raglan sleeves in woven fabric. Zip down the front, side pockets and reflective details. Unlined.
Sleeveless dresses in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.

Imitation leather sandals with wide, crossover straps at the front, an ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening, and a loop at the back. Imitation leather linings and insoles and fluted ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs with a zip at the hems.
Turban in a soft rib knit with a decorative knot detail at the front.
Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh details, a racer back and wide elasticated hem. Medium support.
Jumper in a fine knit with a reversible sequin motif on the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cycling shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
T-shirt in stretch jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with short, lace-trimmed sleeves.
Cap in felted fabric containing some wool with an adjustable hook and loop tab at the back. Lined.
Vest top in a soft, fine knit with high, lace-trimmed slits in the sides.
